headline: Exelon Corporation Declares Dividend
summary: CHICAGO, April 29, 2025--The Board of Directors of Exelon Corporation declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.40 per share on Exelon’s common stock. The dividend is payable on June 13, 2025, to Exelon’s shareholders of record as of the close of business on May 12, 2025.

raw.headline: Exelon Corporation Declares Dividend

headline: Exelon’s Board of Directors Appoints W. Paul Bowers as Chair
summary: CHICAGO, April 29, 2025--Exelon (Nasdaq: EXC) today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed W. Paul Bowers as its Independent Board Chair, effective April 29. Mr. Bowers has been an Independent Director on Exelon’s Board since 2021. The change comes at the retirement of outgoing Board Chair, John F. Young, who has served in the role since 2022.

headline: Top Wind Energy Stocks to Add to Your Portfolio for Solid Returns
summary: Leading wind energy stocks like EXC, BEP, AES and PCG present compelling opportunities, given their strong foothold in the market and focus on expansion.
